inputs.name: Email addresses
inputs.help_text: Enter email addresses separated by semicolon.

inputs.name: Email Schedule
inputs.help_text: Select the interval to generate and send the report email notifications.

inputs.name: Generate Full Report
inputs.help_text: Check to generate and send a complete report every time. If unchecked, only incremental changes are included.

inputs.name: Save Changes
inputs.help_text: Click to save the changes made to the email notification settings.

inputs.name: Reset
inputs.help_text: Click to reset the email notification settings to their previous state.

inputs.name: Test Settings
inputs.help_text: Click to test the email notification settings.

actions: Configure email notification settings for reports.
Set the schedule for report email notifications (daily, weekly, monthly).
Enable or disable the generation of full reports.
constraints: Email addresses must be separated by a semicolon.
At least one email address must be provided to enable notifications.
The schedule must be selected from the available options (daily, weekly, monthly).

errors.description: The email address entered is not in a valid format.
No email address provided. At least one email address is required.
The selected schedule is not valid. Please choose from daily, weekly, or monthly.

steps: Navigate to System > Configuration > Notification > Email Notification.
Choose to use emails from General Settings or enter custom email addresses.
Select the interval for email notifications (daily, weekly, monthly).
Optionally, enable the 'Generate Full Report' checkbox.
Click 'Save Changes' to apply the settings.
